vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_5.sol#28-37):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_5.sol#35)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_am) (patch_5.sol#34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reEntrancyMutex (patch_5.sol#36)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_5.sol#18-26):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_5.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reEntrancyMutex (patch_5.sol#25)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_5.sol#18-26):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_5.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_5.sol#24)
